Today in Caithness, it's a bit rough with 5 ft @ 6s S swell and fresh 34 mph SSW winds, making it blown out across the board. Tomorrow, conditions improve significantly with 7 ft @ 10s W swell and light 9 mph SSW winds, offering clean options at spots like Point of Ness and Murkle Point. The day after, the swell drops to 5 ft @ 14s NW with moderate winds, still providing fun waves at the same spots. Best: tomorrow.
